text: Idea: For the blog, offer a "Category" and "Topic" for grouping similar to WordPress. People who use both on WP might find it hard to have to combine them all together or remove the "tags" from WP.
Yes please! I've had this talk like a million times with clients who migrated from WP. Also had to do some weird workarounds to make their blog designs work the way they did in WP.
